text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O and I have been<n>hard at work during
Tracen<n>Academy's summer camp, and<n>we've finally
reached the last day.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh... What a beautiful day! I can feel<n>the sun's energy
pouring into me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, let's get down to business!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As the model of punctuality, I never<n>waste time! Not even a
millisecond!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I just can't wait for tonight! ♪ It's<n>been so long since I've
been to a<n>festival. Do you think they'll have<n>candy
apples?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
They should, right? Although I prefer<n>candied fruit slices
myself! You can<n>eat them in just one bite.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A festival, eh... I had no idea.
choice_data_list: Would you like to go after training?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I was just about to suggest the same<n>thing! Hehe, we're
on the same<n>wavelength!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All right, it's decided! We're going to<n>a festival after this!
Let this be extra<n>motivation for today's training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once we finish our day of training on<n>the beach, Sakura
Bakushin O and I<n>head back to prepare for the festival.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Chatter, chatter...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... Is everyone going to the<n>festival? Uh... it might be a
bit crowded.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
A bit? Now that's an<n>understatement... We better stick<n>
together. Don't want to get lost.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing all the Umamusume getting<n>ready to go to the
festival, I start to get<n>nervous. What if I lose Sakura<n>
Bakushin O in the crowd...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Apologies for the wait, Trainer! I'm all<n>ready to go!
choice_data_list:
Before that, I need you to promise me
something.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Okay, what is it?
choice_data_list: Do your best not to get lost, okay?
Do your best not to get lost, okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course! As class representative,<n>safety is always my top
priority!
choice_data_list: If you get lost, call me.
If you get lost, call me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Right, communication is an important<n>tool for anyone, but
especially the<n>class representative! Leave it to me!
choice_data_list: Do you even have your cell phone?
Do you even have your cell phone?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yup, I have it in my bag—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: AHHH! My bag! I almost forgot it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: D-don't worry! I'll be right back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Sakura Bakushin O'sabsentmindedness does not inspire confidence...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Look at all these stalls! The<n>food! The festival
dance!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This brings back so many memories...<n>My parents were
always so<n>impressed by my skills in the<n>shooting and
fishing games.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohhh, this is sooo exciting!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That does it, we're visiting ALL the<n>stalls! Let's start over
there! Ready,<n>set...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: BAKUSHIIIN!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My efforts to stop her are in vain, and<n>before I know it, she
disappears into<n>the crowd...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the festival venue as crowded<n>as it is, I soon lose track
of Sakura<n>Bakushin O completely.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As planned, I try calling her cell<n>phone, but all I hear is an
automated<n>message saying she can't be<n>reached... I
should find the organizers<n>and—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: TRAAAIIINEEEERRR!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Can you hear me?! I'm over here,<n>Trainer! Where are you?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I whip my head around at the sound<n>of Bakushin O's voice.
All I see is<n>more people, but I head in the<n>direction of her
calls.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hello, hello?! Trainer, answer me!<n>Trai—wait, why's my
screen black?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Traaaiiineeerrr! Where are youuuu?!<n>My cell phone isn't
working!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A black screen... Judging by the fact<n>that I haven't received
any calls, that<n>can only mean one thing...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, now that you mention it,<n>it's off! Wait—Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Thank goodness you found me! I<n>thought I'd lost you for
good!
choice_data_list: So you did try to call me...
So you did try to call me...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course I did!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The class representative always<n>keeps her promises!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I trust you, Trainer! I know<n>you only have my best
interests at<n>heart!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Just like I always keep my fellow<n>students in mind!
choice_data_list: I'm just glad we found each other.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Agreed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Considering the crowd, I was worried<n>you might have been
hurt!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But it seems that didn't happen... to<n>either of us!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And now, we have been reunited!<n>And it feels so good!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'd say we're a winning combination<n>if there ever was one!
I can't wait to<n>see where we go in the future!<n>Here's to
us, Trainer! Put 'er there!<n>Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I shake Sakura Bakushin O's hand<n>as the festival music
plays on. We still<n>have room to grow, but I can't wait to<n>
see what this so-called "winning<n>combination" can do.
